content: वारः [वृ-घञ्] {@--1@} That which covers, a cover. {@--2@} A multitude, large number; as in वारयुवति. {@--3@} A heap; quantity. {@--4@} A herd, flock; <ls>Śi. 18. 56.</ls> {@--5@} A day of the week; as in बुधवार, शनिवार. {@--6@} Time, turn; शशकस्य वारः समायातः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; अप्सरावारपर्यायेण <ls>V. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 18</ls>; often used in <ab>pl.</ab> like the English ‘times’; बहुवारान् ‘many times’ कतिवारान् ‘how many times’. {@--7@} A An occasion, opportunity. {@--8@} A door, gate. {@--9@} The opposite bank of a river. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--11@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A tail. --रं {@--1@} A vessel for holding spirituous liquor. {@--2@} A mass of water (जलसंघ).
